query: Set an alarm at 4:30 PM on Thursdays for my online meeting.
I need a reminder to pick up the dry cleaning every Friday at 5 PM.
Set a timer for my laundry in 1 hour, ideally with no user interface popping up.

response.desc: Set a timer for your laundry to run for 1 hour without user interface popups.

query: I need to time my 5-minute presentation; please set a timer and skip any UI if possible.

response.desc:
The following are common actions for alarm clock apps, including the information you need
to create an intent filter to advertise your app's ability to perform each action.
To create a countdown timer, use the ACTION_SET_TIMER action and specify timer details such as the duration using the following extras.
Note: This intent is available in Android 4.4 (API level 19) and higher.

query: If I want to disable an alarm, how can I quickly find the list of all my alarms?

response.solution: Use ACTION_SHOW_ALARMS intent to view the list of all your alarms.

query: What alarms do I have set that remind me of daily tasks? Can I see them?
I'm looking to reach out to my family members only; how can I select them from my contacts effectively?

mime.CommonDataKinds.Phone.CONTENT_TYPE: Pick from contacts with a phone number.
mime.CommonDataKinds.Email.CONTENT_TYPE: Pick from contacts with an email address.
mime.CommonDataKinds.StructuredPostal.CONTENT: Pick from contacts with a postal address.

query: I need to quickly select a contact to send them an image. How can I do that?
I need to email my professor about a project. How can I select their email address from my contacts without scrolling too much?

response.solution: Select the contact to which you want to send the email and then navigate to the email application. You can also search for the contact in the email application by typing their name.

query: What do I do if I can't recall my coworker's phone number? Can you assist me in picking it?
I'd like to send a thank-you email to my hiring manager after an interview. His email is hiringmanager@example.com. How should I do this?

response.uri: sms:hiringmanager@example.com sms:billing@example.com mms:hiringmanager@example.com mms:billing@example.com These schemes are all handled the same way.

extras.subject: Thank you for considering me for the role
extras.sms_body: I would like to express my gratitude for taking the time to meet with me during our recent interview. Your insight and advice were invaluable and have helped me prepare for the position we discussed. Looking forward to the opportunity to work together.

query: How can I send a farewell email to my colleagues who I worked with for years? His email is colleagues@example.com.

extras.subject: A farewell email
extras.sms_body:
Dear Colleagues,

I am writing to express my gratitude for our collaborative efforts over the past years. Your unwavering support and camaraderie have been invaluable to me both personally and professionally.

Looking forward to the future opportunities to collaborate again and continue our mutual growth.

Best regards,
Your Name

Can I select multiple PDF files to send via email at once?

query: I need to switch my mobile data on for a short time; how do I open those settings?
I need to troubleshoot my hotspot settings since my friends can't connect. Where do I go?

response.description: Open the System Settings app to troubleshoot hotspot settings by searching for 'Hotspot'. Use this intent if you want to access the System Settings without having to manually type the name of the app.

query: Where can I configure my privacy settings to control app permissions?
I want to adjust my device’s PIN settings but can't seem to get the settings panel to open. What should I do?

response.solution: Try opening the settings app and enable 'Unlock Screen' or 'Screen Lock and PIN'.

query: I keep getting pop-ups asking for location access; how can I manage this in settings?

response.solution: Please go to System Settings > Location > Permissions > Manage Location Sources.
